lines.text: I been sayin' goodbye to my baby.

[showing Charmaine's flower]
Oh, yeah? Your baby? Says you!

[showing Charmaine's diaper pin]
Yeah, says me!
Howd'ya like my baby? C'mere, nice gal, I got a present for ya!
I seen Sergeant Quirt, and he said he took her away from Flagg.
Oh, yeah? Well, you tell that slug the man ain't made that can take my gal! Ain't that right, baby?
Gee whiz, you dames are expensive! Here's the last one. Now I'm broke.
There's Sergeant Quirt. Boy, he sure knows how to get the dames.
Well, I'll be seeing you later, mademoiselles. Bye!
Hello, beautiful! Now I guess it's just me and my baby, huh?
Hey, where'dya get that your baby stuff? She's my gal!

[giving Charmaine a lollipop]
We'll settle this right now! C'mon, baby, who's the king?
Listen, baby, I gots to go now. You be good till I get back. And stay away from that slug Sergeant Quirt! He's a snake in the grass!
